title: Who Are Pantheons counters
body: Hi I am a new player learning to play Pantheon. Who are his counters?

replies.body:
Ive found that {{champion:13}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:98}} do quite well against panth.

Ryze is ruthless vs just about any melee champion, and your passive is virtually useless against him, unless you know both Ryze and Panth inside out, just play very passive until you hit 6 and then roam to help the other lanes.
Ryze is one of the champions like Yorick and Heimherdinger, you can beat them later on, but you will very likely lose lane. 

A good poppy will be able to predict your jump, and use her W, which will not only prevent you from stunning her, it will also end up stunning (knocking up) you, so you should not use your stun until she has used W. Poppy is also a very good anti-tank/bruiser champion. You would want to avoid extended fights against her, try poking her down with Q 
before hard engaging. 

Shen is a strong champion, and your passive only block 1 of his 3 enhanced autos, when he engages on you, you should stun him as soon as he uses his W, and try to waste as much of his time as you can, until his W ends. He is at his weakest once it is down, you can hard engage him then. 

Hope this is of some help.

{{champion:31}} He wants to jump on you, q your feet, it'll knock him up after the stun, and you'll recover and can walk away.
You think he want's to jump on you, silence and walk away.
He wants to just sit and farm, your E gives free poke. Even if he blocks one of your AA's, the e damage goes through.
as long as you don't let him all in you at levels 2 and 3, you should be able to sustain enough in lane to overcome his bully factor, he'll go OOM trying to poke you out.
{{champion:48}} Trundle's AA reset on Q (and AD steal) makes trading with him very hard. His passive sustain also makes it hard for pantheon to lower him enough to burst him down since Trundle can heal from every minion, even if he's not getting the killing blow on it.

Other like {{champion:58}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:54}}  can be a pain also but it depends on there lv of play. ( as does all champs )

IF your playing{{champion:80}}  
1)If you can't snowball your lane, try to push your lane and go roam with your ulti. If you know u will reach late game, focus on Black Cleaver and go full tank.
2) buildpath Youmus, Blackcleaver, Hextrinker/Banshee
3) Your decision making must be on point, dont force ur ult/situation
4) your not looking to KILL your top laner 24/7 ( if you can awesome) but more so looking to roam mid counter jg and possible back ulit bot or if playing in a team and going Flash TP and roaming when u can.
